# IDIATE Technology - Cinematic React Website

This is a React project for IDIATE Technology featuring:
- Cinematic animations and transitions
- Web Audio API integration
- Tailwind CSS styling
- Lucide React icons
- Multi-scene navigation with parallax effects

## Project Structure
- `src/` - React components and main application code
- `public/` - Static assets
- `package.json` - Dependencies and scripts
- `vite.config.js` - Vite configuration
- `tailwind.config.js` - Tailwind CSS configuration

## Development Commands
- `npm run dev` - Start development server
- `npm run build` - Build for production
- `npm run preview` - Preview production build
